content:
When heading out, you can bring friends along!
Not only does everyone have their own special talents,
but you can also share each other's pockets!

Even though I, Sani, am amazing at fishing,
I only care about having fun— oh wait, I mean,
the fishing process itself!

And you're so quick with the blade!
Never judge a book by its cover.

Going out is super——wild!
Due to the turbulent flows,
the destinations might have different environments and affected ecosystems.

When I, Sani, go outside,
my favorite thing to study is~
all those little fishies I've never seen before, swimming freely here and there!

When you don't know where to go,
let the rapids decide for you!
It'll lead you to the most~ fun~ destination ever!

I've got some extra pocket space,
I can share it with you to store your stuff!

As for Frostia, she's quite good at chopping trees,
She keeps mumbling about samples and stuff
while chopping away...

In other words,
Every time you head out, it's a different adventure!
And the rewards will be different too.
